channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Piecing together the Agent puzzle: MCP, authentication & authorization, and Durable Objects free tier】将代理难题拼凑在一起：MCP，身份验证和授权和耐用对象免费层
item.description: 【 Cloudflare delivers toolkit for AI agents with new Agents SDK support for MCP (Model Context Protocol) clients, authentication/authorization/hibernation for MCP servers and Durable Objects free tier. 】CloudFlare为AI代理提供了具有新代理SDK支持MCP（模型上下文协议）客户端的工具包，MCP服务器的身份验证/授权/Hibernation和耐用对象免费层。

item.title: 【Deploy your Next.js app to Cloudflare Workers with the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext】使用OpenNext的CloudFlare适配器将您的下一个应用程序应用于CloudFlare工人
item.description: 【 With the 1.0-beta release of the Cloudflare adapter for OpenNext, you can host your Next.js 14 and 15 applications on Cloudflare Workers. 】借助OpenNext的CloudFlare适配器的1.0-beta版本，您可以在Cloudflare工人上托管下一个和15个应用程序。

item.title: 【Introducing AutoRAG: fully managed Retrieval-Augmented Generation on Cloudflare】引入Autorag：在Cloudflare上完全管理的检索演出一代
item.description: 【 AutoRAG is here: fully managed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines powered by Cloudflare's global network and powerful developer ecosystem. 】Autorag在这里：由CloudFlare的全球网络和强大的开发人员生态系统提供支持的完全管理的检索型生成（RAG）管道。

item.title: 【Cloudflare acquires Outerbase to expand database and agent developer experience capabilities】CloudFlare获取外基础以扩展数据库和代理开发人员体验能力
item.description: 【 Cloudflare has acquired Outerbase, expanding our database and agent developer experience capabilities. 】CloudFlare已收购了OuterBase，扩展了我们的数据库和代理开发人员体验功能。

item.title: 【Cloudflare Workflows is now GA: production-ready durable execution】CloudFlare工作流程现在是GA：可生产的耐用执行
item.description: 【 Workflows — a durable execution engine built directly on top of Workers — is now Generally Available. We’ve landed new human-in-the-loop capabilities, more scale, and more metrics. 】工作流 - 直接在工人顶部建立的耐用执行引擎 - 现在通常可以使用。我们已经降落了新的人类功能，更多的规模和更多的指标。

item.title: 【Skip the setup: deploy a Workers application in seconds】跳过设置：在几秒钟内部署工人应用程序
item.description: 【 You can now add a Deploy to Cloudflare button to your repository’s README when building a Workers application, making it simple for other developers to set up and deploy your project! 】现在，您可以在构建工人应用程序时将其添加到CloudFlare按钮中的CloudFlare按钮中，从而使其他开发人员可以简单地设置和部署您的项目！

item.title: 【Build global MySQL apps using Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive】使用CloudFlare工人和HyperDrive构建全局MySQL应用程序
item.description: 【 MySQL comes to Cloudflare Workers and Hyperdrive: MySQL drivers and ORMs are now compatible with Workers runtime, and Hyperdrive allow you to connect to your regional database from Workers. 】MySQL来到Cloudflare工人和HyperDrive：MySQL驱动程序和ORMS现在与工人的运行时兼容，并且超级驱动器可让您从工人连接到您的区域数据库。

item.title: 【Your frontend, backend, and database — now in one Cloudflare Worker】您的前端，后端和数据库 - 现在在一个Cloudflare工人中
item.description: 【 You can now deploy static sites and full-stack applications on Cloudflare Workers. Framework support for React Router v7, Astro, Vue and more are generally available today and Cloudflare Vite plugin. 】现在，您可以在CloudFlare工人上部署静态站点和全堆栈应用程序。今天通常可以使用React Router V7，Astro，Vue等框架支持React路由器V7，以及CloudFlare Vite插件。

item.title: 【Pools across the sea: how Hyperdrive speeds up access to databases and why we’re making it free】跨海的游泳池：高速驱动器如何加快访问数据库的访问以及我们为何免费
item.description: 【 Hyperdrive, Cloudflare's global connection pooler, relies on some key innovations to make your database connections work. Let's dive deeper, in celebration of its availability for Free Plan customers. 】CloudFlare的全局连接池HyperDrive依靠一些关键的创新来使您的数据库连接起作用。让我们更深入地探讨其对免费计划客户的可用性。

item.title: 【"Just use Vite”… with the Workers runtime】“只需使用Vite”…与工人运行时
item.description: 【 The Cloudflare Vite plugin integrates Vite, one of the most popular build tools for web development, with Workers runtime. Today, we announce the 1.0 release and official support for React Router v7. 】CloudFlare Vite插件与工人的运行时集成了Vite，这是Web开发最受欢迎的构建工具之一。今天，我们宣布对React Router V7的1.0发布和官方支持。
